CustomField.description: List of specific automation names to bypass (e.g., AccountTrigger,ContactValidation,LeadFlow). This is a required field with the default value "N/A"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: List of specific automation names to bypass (e.g., AccountTrigger,ContactValidation,LeadFlow). This is a required field with the default value "N/A"
CustomField.label: Specific Automation Bypass
